system.controller

Class SystemController

  • java.lang.Object
    • system.controller.SystemController

  • public class SystemController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the controller which controls and holds all the other controller in the system. It act as the transport center of all the other controllers and holding the system status as well.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Andy Tsang
